nodes.text: The Wayfar spies were a group of spies based near the town of Wayfar on Tatooine. Circa 1 ABY, the Wayfar spies were recruited by Bib Fortuna, Jabba the Hutt's majordomo, to spy Romo Vax. Fortuna suspected Vax to double cross Jabba's organisation. However, Romo Vax managed to lure one of Bib Fortuna's henchman and made him assassinate Dewall Paez and some other Wayfar spies.
